name: @agentgazer/cli
description: AgentGazer â€” From Observability to Control. Monitor, govern, and protect your AI agents.

scripts.build: tsc && node --input-type=module -e "import fs from 'fs';import path from 'path';import {fileURLToPath} from 'url';const __dirname=path.dirname(fileURLToPath(import.meta.url));const src=path.resolve(__dirname,'../../apps/dashboard-local/dist');const dst=path.resolve(__dirname,'dist/dashboard');if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.cpSync(src,dst,{recursive:true});console.log('Copied dashboard to dist/dashboard')}else{console.warn('Warning: dashboard-local/dist not found')}"
